function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited management-level skill or qualification","Impact":"Obstacles in implementing creative ideas and innovation","Mitigation":"Investing in training and development for the management team","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, training software","People":"Small and medium enterprises (SMEs)","Owner":"Business owners, HR departments"},{"Description":"Government-imposed health regulations","Impact":"Disruption of business operations and financial strain","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to health regulations, implementing safety measures","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, remote work tools","People":"Small businesses, employees","Owner":"Business owners, government agencies"},{"Description":"Changed consumer behavior","Impact":"Adaptation challenges and uncertainty in market demand","Mitigation":"Market research, customer behavior analysis, agile business strategies","Technologies":"Big data analytics, customer relationship management (CRM) software","People":"Small businesses, marketing departments","Owner":"Business owners, marketing teams"}]}
